attributes.action: Want universal credit not to take into account student loan as a form of income
attributes.additional_details: Stop taking into account student loan as an income while on universal credits. As still have to work part-time to survive and pay bill, as well as pay for books and equipment for study
attributes.background:
Universal-credit claim that student maintenance loan is clased as an income.
Income is money earnt and not paid back, this loan is paid back with interest, putting more pressure on students to work longer hours when trying to earn a degree.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633125
